00019    * Constructor.
00020    */
00021    CosineDihedral::CosineDihedral()
00022     : nDihedralType_(0)
00023    { for (int i = 0; i < MaxNDihedralType; ++i) kappa_[i] = 0.0; }
00024 
00025    /* 
00026    * Copy constructor.
00027    */
00028    CosineDihedral::CosineDihedral(const CosineDihedral& other)
00029     : nDihedralType_(other.nDihedralType_)
00030    { for (int i = 0; i < nDihedralType_; ++i) kappa_[i] = other.kappa_[i]; }
00031 
00032    /* 
00033    * Assignment.
00034    */
00035    CosineDihedral& CosineDihedral::operator = (const CosineDihedral& other)
00036    {
00037       nDihedralType_ = other.nDihedralType_;
00038       for (int i = 0; i < nDihedralType_; ++i) kappa_[i] = other.kappa_[i];
00039       return *this;
00040    }
00041 
00042    /* 
00043    * Set the nDihedralType_ member.
00044    */
00045    void CosineDihedral::setNDihedralType(int nDihedralType)
00046    {  
00047       if (nDihedralType > MaxNDihedralType) {
00048          UTIL_THROW("nDihedralType > CosineDihedral::MaxNDihedralType");
00049       }
00050       nDihedralType_ = nDihedralType;
00051    }
00052 
00053    /* 
00054    * Read bend interaction parameters kappa from file.
00055    */
00056    void CosineDihedral::readParam(std::istream &in) 
00057    {
00058       // Preconditions
00059       if (nDihedralType_ <= 0) {
00060          UTIL_THROW("nDihedralType must be set before readParam");
00061       }
00062 
00063       // Read parameters
00064       readBegin(in, "CosineDihedral");
00065       readCArray<double>(in, "kappa",  kappa_,  nDihedralType_);
00066       readEnd(in);
00067    }
00068 
00069    /*
00070    * Modify a parameter, identified by a string.
00071    */
00072    void CosineDihedral::set(std::string name, int type, double value)
00073    {
00074       if (name == "kappa") {
00075          kappa_[type] = value;
00076       } else {
00077          UTIL_THROW("Unrecognized parameter name");
00078       }
00079    }
00080 
00081    /*
00082    * Get a parameter value, identified by a string.
00083    */
00084    double CosineDihedral::get(std::string name, int type) const
00085    {
00086       double value = 0.0;
00087       if (name == "kappa") {
00088          value = kappa_[type];
00089       } else {
00090          UTIL_THROW("Unrecognized parameter name");
00091       }
00092       return value;
00093    }

00098    std::string CosineDihedral::className() const
00099    {  return std::string("CosineDihedral"); }
